name: Fantasy (R'n'H Microtec)
overview: An adult erotic game. In the late 80's when this came out, the company said they hoped that the increase of knowledge and information that computers would bring to the world could help us to overcome the puritanical shackles that we've put on ourselves and help us to understand, help and love everyone more equally. They hoped that the coming decades would lead to a world where they wouldn't be subject to knee-jerk ban and burn censorship and that the cry of, "Think of the children!" would be traded for something more elevated.
